block.p: VARDY-Catherine. Born in Bawnboy Cavan, Ireland. On September 29, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Francis. Devoted mother of Francis P. Vardy and the late John T. Vardy. Dear mother-in-law of Linda Vardy Kedenburg and Jane Vardy. Dear sister of Elizabeth McGovern. Proud grandmother of Kristen Taudel and Thomas John Vardy. Family will receive friends at the Leo F. Kearns Funeral Home, 61-40 Woodhaven Blvd, Rego Park, Monday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Funeral Mass Tuesday, 10:30 AM, Our Lady of Hope RC Church. Interment St. Charles Cemetery.
